sentences.en: "Go and have a word with her, Ken," Webb instructed.
sentences.cn: “肯，去和她谈谈吧，”韦布吩咐道。

sentences.en: Abstract words are beyond [ outside , not within ] the ken of children.
sentences.cn: 抽象的言辞 超出 小孩所理解的范围.

sentences.en: Don't get Ken onto politics or we'll be here all night!
sentences.cn: 不要让肯谈起政治,否则我们就要在这里呆一夜了.

sentences.en: Ken began to lament the death of his only son.
sentences.cn: 肯开始对独子的死悲痛不已。

sentences.en: Ken passed the books to Sergeant Parrott.
sentences.cn: 肯把那些书递给帕罗特警官。

sentences.en: Ken put out his foot and tripped me up.
Ken was in the act of paying his bill when Neil came up behind him.
sentences.cn: 当尼尔从后面走过来时，肯正在付账。

sentences.en: Mr Burlatsky had been invited by his European parliament opposite number, Mr Ken Coates.
sentences.cn: 布尔拉茨基先生受到了欧洲议会同级官员肯·科茨先生的邀请。
我们无法理解的神秘事物

sentences.en: Red Ken won seat in Parliament.
sentences.cn: 左翼的肯赢得了议会席位.

sentences.en: Such things are beyond my ken.
The subject matter was so technical as to be beyond the ken of the average layman.
sentences.cn: 该主题专业性太强，一般的外行人很难理解。

sentences.en: The workings of the Stock Exchange are beyond most people's ken.
sentences.cn: 证券交易所的运作情况大多数人都不了解.

sentences.en: What happens after death is beyond our ken.
sentences.cn: 死后会怎样我们不得而知.

sentences.en: Why people are prepared to tolerate a four hour journey each day for the dubious privilege of living in the country is beyond my ken.
sentences.cn: 为了农村生活的模糊的好处,人们为何甘愿忍受每天在路上花四个小时,这便超越了我的见识了.

trans.tran_cn: 视野, 知识领域, 见地
trans.tran_en: if something is beyond your ken, you have no knowledge or understanding of it

trans.tran_cn: <苏格兰>知道，懂得，<古>看到，<方>认出
